reviews.review_msg: He has a good lecture voice.  Phil 001 was kinda hard though. I took some other phil. class with him (think it was 110) which was slightly easier

The lectures were boring in both of these classes, perhaps not the fault of the teacher, but the fault of the material.  I didn't attend many lectures for each class but still managed to get an A+.  The classes are very easy for comp. sci. students.
